definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Oh, isn't this a Taoist temple?
sentences.chinese: 啊，这不就是一座道观嘛？

sentences.english: As for the Dao of governance, both of them take the idea that human conducts should be in conformity with the Dao of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 在治道观上，两者均取推天道以明人事的思维取象。

sentences.english: We have helped Louguantai create the first ever Daoist ecology temple.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经帮助楼观台创立了第一个生态道观。

sentences.english: He served as eastern Zhejiang An Fusi Services Officer, rank over, lifting Taizhou worship Taoist.
sentences.chinese: 后任浙东安抚司参议官，秩满，提举台州崇道观。

sentences.english: There is close relation between Wang Jide' opera theories and the Zhongguan Doctrine of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 王骥德的曲学与佛教中道观有着密切关系。

sentences.english: Despite the rebuilding of temples, religious life is still tightly limited.
sentences.chinese: 尽管寺庙道观纷纷重建，宗教生活仍然受到严格限制。

sentences.english: Despite the rebuilding of temples religious life is still tightly limited.
sentences.chinese: 尽管重建了道观，宗教生活仍然受到严格限制。

sentences.english: This is the most outstanding thought of the nature of law reflected in "Book of Changes".
sentences.chinese: 这是《易经》所体现的最突出的天道观思想。

sentences.english: Then we visited a Taoist temple.
sentences.chinese: 后来，我们去道观溜达了一圈。

sentences.english: It is a Taoist temple, called Qingyin Pavilion.
It is this question triggered a traditional Chinese philosophy of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正是这一追问引发了中国传统哲学中的天道观。

definition: Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
(literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
a room in a Buddhist monastery/a temple
